name: TextAlignment
desc: An alignment position for text along the horizontal axis.

items.name: static var allCases: [TextAlignment]
items.desc: A collection of all values of this type.

items.name: typealias AllCases
items.desc: A type that can represent a collection of all values of this type.

items.name: static func == (TextAlignment, TextAlignment) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two text alignments are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two text alignments are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the text alignment by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the text alignment.
